storyInfo: Within the Soul Furnace of Kazdel, a ceremony meant to placate the revenants instead incites their anger. The airship fires its cannons at the Furnace, and fireworks light up the night sky. Nymph, doing her best to look after a furnace node, picks up a talking firework fragment, and in doing so takes on a special task.

attributes.text: You must be bored of nights like this.
The ones where the damp, cold fog creeps up on the roaring fires of the furnace. Ash permeates the air, its choking stench a constant assault on the nostrils.
Hard to imagine being able to sleep like this. Cramming a whole day's worth of work into an all-too-short dream, before awakening to find that things remain unchanged.
A black city, black stones, black clouds, and a blood-red flame ensconced in a furnace, unchanging since time immemorial.
No, this is not particularly conducive to a good night's sleep. At the very least, something should fill the dreary silence.
Something like...

attributes.content: 9:30 P.M. \ Overcast
Kazdel, Residential District
The fire of the Soul Furnace~♪ Is Kazdel's sun truest~♪
attributes.name: Guitar-Playing Singer

attributes.content: It dries our childrens' clothes~♪ Warms our warriors' hearts~♪
attributes.name: Guitar-Playing Singer

attributes.content: (Stamps hoof to the beat)
attributes.name: Docile Burdenbeast

attributes.content: Moo~ Moo~
attributes.name: Docile Burdenbeast

attributes.content: There's no better place in Kazdel~♪ Than the plaza by the Furnace~♪ Those stingy little hawkers~♪ Haggle with some loser mercs~♪
attributes.name: Guitar-Playing Singer

attributes.content: Who the *Sarkaz swearing* do you think you're mouthing off about?! Your singing stinks! Going on all day like a broken horn.
attributes.name: Weapon-Maintaining Mercenary

attributes.content: We didn't lose to the Victorians! We had to—what were those again?
attributes.name: Weapon-Maintaining Mercenary

attributes.content: The fighters console themselves~♪ Calling it tactical retreat~♪
attributes.name: Guitar-Playing Singer

attributes.content: Right! It was a lactical defeat.
attributes.name: Weapon-Maintaining Mercenary

attributes.content: But even his burdenbeasts know~♪ His knapsack is now empty~♪ His daughter's not seen him in years~♪ Now~ looks~ at~ him~ funny~♪
attributes.name: Guitar-Playing Singer

attributes.content: The crowd warming by the furnace node begins to laugh.
Suddenly, an ear-piercing sound rends the air. The laughter abruptly stops.
Err... The warrior's an angry manglerbeast~♪ His hands, like claws, reach for my throat♪ Won't someone come to save me... (croak)♪
attributes.name: Guitar-Playing Singer

attributes.content: Oh, she will! Over here my savior comes—♪
attributes.name: Guitar-Playing Singer

attributes.content: The ceremony starts in five minutes! Knock it off! What did I say about putting your music sheets in the cordon, Snapstring? Get your clutter away from the Furnace already!
attributes.name: Overwhelmed Girl

attributes.content: And you, Steelskull, back off from the cordon a bit. Unless you want your burdenbeast buddies to burn their fur?
attributes.name: Overwhelmed Girl

attributes.content: Oh, it's you, Nymph. Joining in on the fun?
attributes.name: Weapon-Maintaining Mercenary

attributes.content: Relax, this broken furnace only spits out sparks. I'd know better than you, right? Settle down.
attributes.name: Weapon-Maintaining Mercenary

attributes.content: My head nearly got crushed~♪ But now I do recall~♪ I wanted to give the souls in the Furnace~♪ One last farewell song~♪
attributes.name: Guitar-Playing Singer

attributes.content: (Calmly warms itself by the fire)
attributes.name: Docile Burdenbeast

attributes.content: I get it, not everyone's thirty-something like you. But things are about to change The Furnace used to burn revenants for power, but we're about to switch to a new source of energy.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Ermi says tonight's ceremony will be really, really important to get the revenants to come out. If something goes wrong and the Furnace goes 'boom'—
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Steelskull! Are you even listening?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: I saw much worse out there! Even the Feline's cannons barely even singed these guys, so what's a rinky-dink oven going to do, even if it blows?
attributes.name: Weapon-Maintaining Mercenary

attributes.content: The fire's just right tonight. Might as well get my blade reforged.
attributes.name: Weapon-Maintaining Mercenary

attributes.content: (Harrumphs happily)
attributes.name: Burdenbeast by the Fire

attributes.content: Why... won't you guys just listen?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Fine! I'll do it myself!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Hey, don't tug on my burdenbeasts! They—
attributes.name: Weapon-Maintaining Mercenary

attributes.content: Waahh!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: They'll think you're playing with them and knock you into the dirt.
attributes.name: Weapon-Maintaining Mercenary

attributes.content: The unreasonable is now reasonable~♪ You bully so you don't get bullied~♪ Our ancestors've seen enough~♪ They're about to go flying free~♪
attributes.name: Guitar-Playing Singer

attributes.content: That's dumb, Sarkaz don't bully Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Weapon-Maintaining Mercenary

attributes.content: (Disdainful whistle)
attributes.name: Guitar-Playing Singer

attributes.content: Ow... That hurt...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: The plaza's packed. Are you really going to tell everyone to go home one by one? You'll need more than one set of legs.
attributes.name: Weapon-Maintaining Mercenary

attributes.content: Can't you just, I dunno, use your Djall powers to scare them all off in one go?
attributes.name: Weapon-Maintaining Mercenary

attributes.content: No, nuh-uh! That's simply out of line! Sarkaz don't bully Sarkaz, remember? Also, you should never, ever treat a Djall's powers so lightly!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Okay okay, no wonder you're the kindest Djall... no, the nicest Sarkaz in all of Kazdel, Nymph. Now go break a leg.
attributes.name: Weapon-Maintaining Mercenary

attributes.content: Nymph looks behind her at the furnace node plaza, filled to the brim with raucous singing, peddlers hawking their wares, and hammers beating on weapons.
In the distance, the Soul Furnace towers above, belching out an acrid, thick black smoke. A careful listener could hear the faint screeching of the revenants.
For the past two hundred years, day after day, it has sent energy to the furnace nodes, which then pass that energy on to the countless homes in Kazdel.
I don't know what will happen to the revenants after the ceremony... Come to think of it, I don't know what a revenant even looks like.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: *sigh* I promised Ermi I'd make sure the people in this neighborhood were safe before the ceremony started.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Why can't the Sarkaz in Kazdel just do as they're told...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: What is the meaning of this? Are you going to let me finish reading or not?
Another fit? Oh good, why don't you milk this out all night? It's not as if you're the one paying for the ceremony, are you?
Enough. I don't like being here and inhaling these noxious gases either. If you could all be a tad bit more cooperative, we could get this over with and be on our separate ways.
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: I shall just carry on from where I was interrupted, not that any of you are listening in the first place.
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: 'The duty of the Soul Furnace nears a close, the torments of thine burning body hereto shall end.'
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: 'Thus under the eyes of the myriad souls do I pray...'
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: If I could offer a comment, though the ceremonial recitation states 'pray', you ought to know that this is more of a... notice.
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: Also, 'Await these rites in peace, spread not thine suffering' means 'pipe down and don't cause a ruckus'. Things are rather hectic in the city right now, and if you could just wait until I have a moment spare, I'll give you all the pomp and circumstance you need.
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: When the time comes, do as you will, whether that means going home or staying here to help. Hell, get into a fight, if that's what you want. Just don't tear down the city walls while you're at it.
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: Did you get all that? Speak up if you did.
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.text: Your rites mean nothing... We have waited and suffered for too long!
You threw us into this furnace...
Too long! The burning! The scorching!

attributes.content: Yes, yes, I understand you've been through a lot. Just to be fair, I didn't throw you in there, and we the Sarkaz today are not ungrateful.
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: What we're doing at this very moment is trying to get you guys out. So pipe down already!
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.text: Millions upon millions of nights... Traveling through the dark, my kindreds, my screams, have been drowned!
Young Lich! A mere child—
Insincere! Insolent! Ignorant!
Still your tongue, cease your lies, and get thee gone!

attributes.content: *Sarkaz swearing* You better do as you're told if you know what's good for you! I've tried to keep this civilized!
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: Act your age already, you're over ten thousand years old—
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: As the wizened Lich rants and raves, a stray glob of slag splashes across his face.
Master! Is everything alright?
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: The gauge indicates that the Furnace's energy output isn't stable. Is something the matter with the ceremony? Do you require my assistance?
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*... *cough*!
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: Stay back! You're not needed yet!
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: *tirade of Sarkaz swearings* Mark my words, if these geriatric fools aren't taken care of by tonight, I'll be Manfred's personal shoeshine!
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*... *cough*!
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: General, you've been standing guard all day. You should take a rest.
attributes.name: Military Commission Soldier

attributes.content: Now's the pivotal moment of the ceremony. Nothing can be allowed to go wrong.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Take your positions. If you notice anything out of the ordinary, report to me at once.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Yes, sir!
attributes.name: Military Commission Soldier

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: It seems Kazdel is still somewhat chilly this time of year.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Hey, you really ready to meet your old pals?
attributes.name: Wiš'adel

attributes.content: Today is a crossroads... The end of an endless history.
attributes.name: Elder Revenant

attributes.content: Their sacrifice may not have been willing, but it was their agony and torment that fueled Kazdel for thousands of years. For that, they have my utmost respect.
attributes.name: Elder Revenant

attributes.content: Not willing? You were the one who caught them and threw them into the Furnace in the first place. You really think you'll manage a nice, peaceful chat with them?
attributes.name: Wiš'adel

attributes.content: Her Highness has restored my sanity and given me clarity. My mind is no longer shrouded in haze, my heart no longer gripped by senseless rage.
attributes.name: Elder Revenant

attributes.content: Let me see them. I'll try to quell their anger. It was I who began this age of suffering. It is only fitting that I end it.
attributes.name: Elder Revenant

attributes.content: Hmph...
attributes.name: Wiš'adel

attributes.content: Here's hoping you can.
attributes.name: Wiš'adel

attributes.content: Their souls are roasting in the Furnace~♪ They've got emotions of every sort~♪ Will they really be ready to wave goodbye~♪ To their old metal home~♪
attributes.name: Guitar-Playing Singer

attributes.content: Hey, you! Stop gawping at the Furnace like an idiot and start gawping at my wares like a genius! If you don't like 'em, you've got no taste! Come take a look, girl... Oh, you again?
attributes.name: Crafty Merchant

attributes.content: Fatwallet! About last time—
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Oh no, are you hurt? You should watch where you're running.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: The girl makes a face and sticks her tongue out at Nymph before peeling off into the distance.
While you're short of customers, Fatwallet, you need to get your stuff outside the cordon. I can help.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Eh, fine by me. Not like I've got any customers.
attributes.name: Crafty Merchant
Nymph
attributes.content: Really?

attributes.name: Nymph
attributes.content: That's great! I'll get started, then.
Gonna need payment first though. If I have to move my whole stall, then you're gonna have to rent the spot from me.
attributes.name: Crafty Merchant

attributes.content: R-Rent? But this is just an empty spot by the road...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Well, it's mine now. It's a good spot by the Furnace, lots of slackers hanging about. It's warm, too. You can get your three squares a day here, without having to waste energy at home. It won't be cheap.
attributes.name: Crafty Merchant

attributes.content: Anyway, that's enough free talk. You want anything more out of me, it's gonna cost ya. You're getting in the way of business here.
attributes.name: Crafty Merchant

attributes.content: Hey—
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Nymph looks to the Soul Furnace with worry. It might be her imagination, but the smoke appears to be getting thicker.
A job only I can do?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Sure, Ermi! My purse has been pretty light lately, so this is a lifesaver! What do you need from me? Repairs? Looking after burdenbeasts? I can do a little bit of everything.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Oh, I would never task you with something so trivial, o kind and considerate Nymph. It'd be a terrible waste of talent.
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: Let me think... What should this position be called... Neighborhood... Officer?
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: Neighborhood Officer?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Alright, I may have just come up with that title. But it's really important! You'll be the friendly neighborhood solver of any tricky issues.
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: As you know, ever since that Victorian business, we've been dreadfully spread thin, and maintaining order in the streets is becoming more difficult by the day.
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: But when it comes to making sure everyone's safe, you're one of the best. You're Kazdel's most considerate Djall, after all.
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: I... I am?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: But... Okay! I get the idea!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Make sure everyone's safe... Just leave it to me, Ermi! I'll do my very best!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Fatwallet, if I rent this spot from you, you'll move outside the cordon, right? That's what you said. Let me see, my...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Where's my purse?!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Wait, it's definitely on me somewhere... I must have put it in another pocket... How could this be...? Maybe I forgot to bring it with me when I left the house...?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Looks like I've got a fool on my hands. Maybe you're a nice, honest soul? Nope, there's no such thing. So a fool you must be.
attributes.name: Crafty Merchant

attributes.content: My purse is gone... And the ceremony's almost over now...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Fatwallet! Please please please move your stall away, please? If you don't move, then Steelskull won't either, then everyone's going to get burned by the Furnace.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Ugh, that big lummox still holding a grudge? All I did was store my goods in his house while he was out fighting. Not like he said I couldn't.
attributes.name: Crafty Merchant

attributes.content: I looked after that daughter of his for years! Him? He slinks back from Victoria, tail between his legs, completely empty-handed. You think I babysit for free?!
attributes.name: Crafty Merchant

attributes.content: You looked after her? You raised her to be a *Sarkaz swearing* thief! I gave her a name so I could send her off to learn to read and write! And you ruined all that!
attributes.name: Weapon-Maintaining Mercenary

attributes.content: Wait, please stop fighting. The Furnace... the cordon... there's no time!
attributes.name: Nymph
Nymph
attributes.content: Ah! That's my purse! Please don't run—

attributes.name: Nymph
attributes.content: Ow!
Nymph is tripped up by the girl and lands face-first in a puddle of mud. Bystanders chuckle as they help her up, and covered from head to toe in muck, she glances dejectedly at the quarreling duo.
Everywhere she looks, people are going about their business as usual within the cordon. Even the pushover wandering singer is sitting cross-legged, composing a new song by the light of the furnace.
Oh what to do, what to do~♪ What she wants~ Is really simple~♪♪ But now she finds herself~ In a pickle♪
attributes.name: Guitar-Playing Singer

attributes.content: You done yet? What's taking so long? Wasn't the last few times real smooth?
attributes.name: Wiš'adel

attributes.content: If you can't hack it, just step down and let me. Hey—
attributes.name: Wiš'adel

attributes.content: *sigh* Who even let you up here, Wiš'adel? Did I not instruct Ermengarde to keep everyone away from the ceremony?
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: It's bad enough that you're here, did you really have to bring that one along too?
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: You've been floating up there forever and nothing's happened. I came because I was worried about you!
attributes.name: Wiš'adel

attributes.content: You came because you wanted to rubberneck! As for being worried about me, best you worry about yourself.
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: What's to worry about? I wasn't the one who stuffed our ancestors in the fire to roast like sweet potatoes.
attributes.name: Wiš'adel

attributes.content: Good. Those who dare speak to a revenant in such a manner tend to meet an unhappy end.
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.text: The murderer... returns.
Is it him? He must... pay! MAKE HIM PAY!
Pain, agony, forsaken... all his debts! How dare he...
Silence, all of you! Listen, to what he has to say!

attributes.content: Debt? I owe you nothing.
It was all... a necessary price to pay.

attributes.text: Then why did you not stay?
Then why do you not throw them in too?
Then why did you return?!

attributes.content: I am here to pick you up.
Your duty is at an end.
I've come to welcome you, as you leave this cramped purgatory.

attributes.text: Ridiculous! Laughable!
It was you who threw us in here! You who left alone!
How dare you? HOW DARE YOU?
How dare you return? So brazen and condescending?
I will see you pay the price! I will see everything burn in the raging flames of this furnace as we did!

attributes.content: I understand your anger. I will face your wrath.
But now, I just want you to come up and see the Kazdel today.
Come and see. See the city you've devoted yourselves to. It is proof that you lived—

attributes.text: You have no place to say that to us!
No, wait... You... the one we called the eldest of revenants...
Why have you become like... this?

attributes.content: Hah...
You need not feel sorrow for me.
My shattered soul has been burned away. Nothing is left.

attributes.text: Eldest of revenants... Why...?
Why are you in a cannon?
No, it's more like a Sankta gun.
Our vaunted elder, trapped inside a Sankta gun.
Haha... Hahahaha!
Hahahahaha...

attributes.content: What're they arguing about, old man? Translate for me.
attributes.name: Wiš'adel

attributes.content: Hmm... I'm not entirely sure it could be called an argument.
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: Huh? Why so quiet all of a sudden? They hashed things out already?
attributes.name: Wiš'adel
Wiš'adel
attributes.content: Pffeh... Pffh! Maybe don't blast ash in your guest's face?

attributes.name: Wiš'adel
attributes.content: What the hell was that?
Based on my prior dealings with these fellows, that would be the equivalent of spitting in your face.
attributes.name: Fremont

attributes.content: Me? What did I do?!
attributes.name: Wiš'adel

attributes.content: *Sarkaz swearing*! Hey, you old farts! What gives?!
attributes.name: Wiš'adel

attributes.content: I... This...
You... are all...
BEYOND REASONING!
What's going on?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: General! Our cannons! They've started charging on their own! I think it's the remnants of the revenant fragment in the core, it's—
attributes.name: Military Commission Soldier

attributes.content: Starting up our guns, is it? What's the target?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: If I'm reading this right... It's the Soul Furnace!
attributes.name: Military Commission Soldier

attributes.content: Quick! Cut all power—
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Fantastical lights explode and streak across the night sky like a rain of fire.
Cold, weary, and unchanging as ever, Kazdel silently absorbs their fiery descent.
There is always someone awake, yearning for a glimpse of something different from the small patch of night sky outside their window.
Something like... a sudden, violent burst of fireworks.
The Furnace!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Who! Fired! That! Cannon?!
attributes.name: Faint Distant Shouting

attributes.content: My roof! Darn it, I just fixed it up a few days ago. Where'd that big rock even come from...? And what's that burning smell?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Ow! My head... hot hot hot!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.text: Dang it...

attributes.content: Eh? Wh-What was that?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: No, I don't have time to worry about the roof...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Everyone, please listen! That accident is definitely connected to the ceremony. The Soul Furnace could restart at any moment. For your safety, please evacuate outside the cordon immediately!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Clang! Clang! Clang! The mercenary mending his weapon keeps hammering away without even looking up.
Come one, come all, come and take a look. You're blind if you don't buy anything—
attributes.name: Crafty Merchant

attributes.content: You... You all really...!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.text: Just *Ancient Sarkaz swearing* die already.

attributes.content: Steelskull's hammer stops mid-swing, Fatwallet's shouting stops mid-sentence, and the wandering singer's guitar string snaps mid-pluck.
Girl... What did you just say?
attributes.name: Weapon-Maintaining Mercenary

attributes.content: I said!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.text: Are you deaf?

attributes.content: Wha... What?
attributes.name: Weapon-Maintaining Mercenary

attributes.content: For the sake of everyone's safety...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.text: Heheheh...
Burn—burn—I'll burn you all into ashes—

attributes.content: H-Hey, calm down... What're you coming over here for? My clothes and the burdenbeasts are fla—err, what was it—flammable!
attributes.name: Weapon-Maintaining Mercenary

attributes.content: He's right, don't do anything crazy!
attributes.name: Crafty Merchant

attributes.content: Get behind the cordon now, or else...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.text: Cowards who flee from battle!
Thieves who steal from their own!
Lowlifes who indulge in pleasure!
Idlers who shirk their duties!
I'll kill you all! Kill! KILL!

attributes.name: Nymph
attributes.content: Or else...

attributes.name: Nymph
attributes.content: Huh? Where'd everyone go?

One by one, the plaza's crowd turned their heads, staring at Nymph in disbelief. Steelskull frantically tries to drag his burdenbeasts out of the cordon, while Fatwallet packs up her stall with surprising speed for someone her age.
Nymph feels something bump into her belly. The girl who stole her purse shoves it back into her hands, then runs off as fast as she can.
The wandering singer now stands meekly outside the cordoned area with his sheets under his arm, as if he has been there the whole time.
Wow, that's...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Nymph scratches her head, setting free the glimmering fragment that had fallen into her hair. It still retains the heat of the Furnace it was so unduly ejected from.
As it tumbles out of her hair, the strange voice in her head cuts off.
Nymph! Can you hear me?
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: Nymph! Nymphy! Hey!
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: Is that you, Ermi? How come I can't see you?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Look at the mirror in the little box I gave you.
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: Wow, Ermi, how'd you get inside the mirror?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Didn't I tell you when I gave it to you? You must have missed the instructions I wrote again.
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: Lich creations aren't so easy to understand. Besides, if I ever need to use it, you'll help me.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: So, what's going on? I saw a really big explosion over by the Furnace!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Something went awry at the ceremony, and now the ancestors are throwing a fit. Get this... the revenant on the airship got into a fight with those in the Furnace!
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: Are you okay?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: I'm fine, a little explosion like that couldn't hurt me. My master's still counting on me to run errands for him, though I have a bit more on my plate than I can handle.
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: As for the Furnace... It's still intact, and there haven't been any further issues. But the explosion caused another problem, and I miiiiight have to ask you for help again!
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: I'm just glad you're alright. Whatever you need help with, just say the word.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: We need to hunt down all the bits of slag that got ejected from the Furnace and see if they have any revenant fragments in them.
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: Revenant... fragments? Are they dangerous? A lot of people here have been picking up shards of stuff that fell from the sky after the explosion.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: They are! Which is why master wants me to find them as quickly as possible. The revenants in the Furnace are restless now that they're missing some of their kind.
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: As for the revenant fragments that are scattered, they're like ticking time bombs. We don't know when they're going to stir up trouble.
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: But don't worry too much. Judging by the number of revenants still inside the Furnace, only a handful of fragments have a revenant riding along. Fewer than ten, in fact.
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: *phew* Finally, some good news. I was thinking about how long it'd take to find every single bit that fell from the sky.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Well, unfortunately, that's the difficult part of all this. We have no idea where these fragments fell. They could be anywhere in Kazdel, really.
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: So, what do the ones with the revenants look like?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: To be honest, I haven't had a proper look at one either. It shouldn't be too hard to identify something with a revenant riding inside it, though. It'll influence the emotions and senses of the people around it.
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: Would they happen to be surrounded by wisps of smoke? Maybe they sparkle and flash too?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Yeah! Something like that!
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: Then you might want to look at this and see if it's what you're looking for... Though I haven't felt it influence my emotions or anything.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Are you at home? I'll head over right now. Whatever you do, don't give that thing to anyone else. We're lucky you're a Djall!
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: Ah, okay! I'm by the furnace node near my house, so come as quick as you can. Hmm... This little rock sure is hot.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Ermi, you're back! What did your master say?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: The good news is that it really was a revenant fragment. Master's already placed it back in the Furnace. The bad news is that we might have been too quick with retrieving it.
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: Why's that a bad thing? Shouldn't we be putting them back right away?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Wait, did your master... compliment you?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Even you have him figured out by now. Yeah, he did, and every time he does, he's almost always building up to bad news!
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: You know how I have to inspect goods going in and out of Kazdel every day, organize patrols, arrange repairs for the holes in the Furnace, and even inventory all the stuff he brought back from Leithanien, right?
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: He's already running me ragged, and now he wants me to...
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: Ermi! Did you try telling him that you're already swamped and that someone else should go gather the fragments?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: I did tell him that! I even told him the only reason we found this first one so quickly was you.
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: And then? Did he change his mind?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Why are you looking at me like that... Wait, Ermi! Hey—!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Nymph~
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: Help me out again, last time I swear. I really have too much to handle and that old tool doesn't really care. Please, you're the only one I can count on now...
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: You just need to find all the fragments and bring them back. I'll give you a nice, big reward if you do.
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: I know you don't really lack anything, but I guarantee it'll be something you really want. And... it's something only I can give you, not even my master could.
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: Well, don't keep me guessing. Just say what it is and I'll think it over.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: I can't tell you too much at the moment, but don't you worry, we Liches are a generous people.
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: Hmph, is that really the proper attitude to ask for help? Anyone else would have walked away, but not this silly Djall. She just lets you walk all over her.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: So fine, I'll help you find these fragments, but do you have a map that can show where they are, Ermi? The kind with the little black dots floating around?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Do you think Liches can just conjure things from thin air? Why would I have something so strange?
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: But you have a point, you'd be chasing your own tail if I just sent you off to find the fragments with no help.
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: Not to mention that you don't have anything that could actually contain the revenant fragments... Pass me that box thing of yours while I think for a second.
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: I'll need some time to give this a few upgrades. Head home and rest for now. Once I'm done, I'll come find you.
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: Eh? I thought this was a super urgent task.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Oh, I wouldn't go that far. And once you have the right tool, you'll save far more time than the few hours it'll take me to make it.
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: Fine, but I still hope you can think over the map thing a bit more. I'll put my box over here. See you later, Ermi!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: A way to detect revenants... To isolate them... What if I dismantled this part...? No, that won't work...
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: Ermi? I'm heading back now. I'll wait for your good news!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Eh? Oh, alright, bye-bye!
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: Liches are always so quick to jump into thinking mode. I really hope she doesn't become like her master one day...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: *yawn* I've got important things to do tomorrow, so I'd better get some rest.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: I wonder how many people will dream about those fireworks tonight?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: *pant* *pant* It's still so hot... like trying to hold a roast sweet potato fresh out of the oven. Can't imagine how hot it must be in the Furnace.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: It's nice to meet you... ancestor sir? I don't quite know what to call you. You must have been burning in the Furnace since my grandparents were still little. You really gave it good to that crowd just now.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Nymph walks over to a quiet corner of the plaza and sits down on some steps.
I should probably put you back where you belong, but getting to meet you was something really special... I'd better tell you what I need to say quick.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: I've always known you were real, ever since I was young. Everyone said you were just stories to scare little kids, but I always believed.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Back then, there was a Babel camp right by my doorstep. Mom and Dad never let me wander too far, so I was always looking for the camp's doctors to play with.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: My favorite fairy tale was the future the Babel doctors told me about.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: And then... My Babel friends left without warning. One day I'd go look for them as usual, and there was just the field.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: I was really sad, so I cried and cried at the furnace node in the plaza, because everyone told me the underground pipes connected to it would carry my voice all the way to the great, big Soul Furnace.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Now that I've seen, or heard you, I feel so happy. You really do exist and you've been protecting us and all of Kazdel this whole time and—
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.text: Noisy.

attributes.content: Sorry!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Nymph's eyes widen as a shadow slowly seeps out of the shimmering slag. It is barely a wisp, as faint as a cicada's wings, but at least he doesn't sound as angry as before.
Shabby.
attributes.name: Slag Shadow

attributes.content: You mean our neighborhood? Haha, well, I think it's kinda nice, once you get used to it.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Barely any improvement.
attributes.name: Slag Shadow
Nymph
attributes.content: Improvement? Oh, you mean compared to two hundred years ago.

attributes.name: Nymph
attributes.content: Right... You've been in the Furnace all that time. Maybe this is your first time out.
Nymph stretches out her hand that the slag is resting on, allowing him a clearer view of the plaza. The first view he's had in two hundred years that did not include flames.
See, ancestor revenant sir? This is where we live nowadays.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: What's that sound?
attributes.name: Slag Shadow

attributes.content: Snapstring's singing. That instrument he's holding is cobbled together from scraps. It looks like a guitar, but I don't know what it's actually called.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: And the mercenary?
attributes.name: Slag Shadow

attributes.content: You mean Steelskull? He's had a few drinks, and now he's dancing around his burdenbeast battle buddies.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: What of the army?
attributes.name: Slag Shadow

attributes.content: Uh... Do you mean the Military Commission? Maybe, umm... Do you see that big airship flying overhead? I've heard they're up there.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Rest—
attributes.name: Slag Shadow

attributes.content: After a long period of silence, that is the only word the slag says. Nymph doesn't quite understand the meaning.
Not too far away, the wandering singer plucks at his instrument and begins to sing a song of farewell, as promised.
